summary:
I'm excited to announce my newly published book Translucence of Memory:  Soul Stories, Spiritual Wanderings, Time Travel.  Available at your nearest Amazon since March 2022.  This is a collection of poetry to bring more beauty, reflection and hope into our lives.  There is a power of memory in our personal stories - our soul stories. 

About my Clinical Nutrition and plant-based work:  My expertise is in the field of natural, plant-based supplements including eco-friendly wellness and beauty products.  I am a plant formulation expert.  I enjoy identifying pure botanicals and creating beautiful products for this emerging new world.  My strength is in formulation development for optimal absorption as well as innovative creative development approaches.  My training and experience includes immune support specifically in nutraceutical ingredients, plant-based ingredients as well as sourcing.  I really enjoy working with people, organizations and communities that identify with the authentic vision to heal our world.      I also work with individuals to teach ways to understand nutritional and plant-based benefits for optimal living.  ~ Ingar Brunnett, Clinical Nutritionist | Plant-based Formulator

I am also the Founder of  Summer Life Naturals.  Here is more about my work as the formulator, creative director and manufacturer of non-gmo, plant-based immune supplements.  Which was manufactured in a NSF cGMP compliant facility in California.  

"My goal is to support immune health with the elements of our world's natural resources.  After years of challenging health concerns and food sensitivities - I have developed a plant-based formula that resonates with both sensitive individuals and other body types.  It has been a quest of mine to bring our customers herbal blends that work well without the harsh side effects.  
 
Many of us have become more conscious to our nutritional choices, the toxins in our environment and even our lifestyles.  It's timely that we make the right decisions in what we choose to sustain ourselves with naturally.  I am dedicated in bringing formulations made with pure vibrant herbs, botanicals and whole foods that work in harmony with our bodies and nature." 

Working with herbs is a sacred practice.  We can experience the positive effects as a collective as we aspire for more of a restorative well-being.  Our formulas have been created with authentic and inspired partnerships.  Our relationship with reputable suppliers, partners and customers are foremost.

certifications.name: Neuroendocrine and Anti-Aging Regulation with emphasis in herbalism, nutraceuticals and homeopathy

company.name: Translucence of Memory:  Soul Stories, Spiritual Wanderings, Time Travel

profile_positions.company: Translucence of Memory:  Soul Stories, Spiritual Wanderings, Time Travel
profile_positions.description:
Translucence of Memory is a beautiful poetry book that is imaginative, thought-provoking and inspirational.  This is a collection of poems and stories about the transformative aspects and expressions of becoming.  They have been written as reflections of self-care, creating sacred space and journeying through these life phases.  Discover time-mastered stories that take a haunting glimpse into the emotional power of memory, self-love and metamorphosis of womanhood.  Enter the state of nurturing, sensuality, grief, family lineage, generational healing, renewal and spiritual wanderings to find yourself.  This is an intimate look at haunting generational narratives that release empowering archetypes of ourselves to help crystallize how we become.  This book is a healing testament for the inner child you hold dear to your heart as well as for the children you may know or other that have grown and have already become.  This is a newly published book that embodies a prophetic time capsule now awakening about the power of memory and storytelling.  

Available in paperback and Kindle on Amazon
profile_positions.title: Author | Designer | Speaker

profile_positions.description: Plant-based clinical nutrition consultations specializing in personalized individual needs, immune support, food sensitivities and weight balancing.  As we all have differing nutritional wants depending on the person, lifestyle and cultural background.  Ingar is also develops and facilitates creative workshops, gatherings and special events.  She is also mentor and enjoys sharing teachings on the powerful benefits of meditation, daily ritual and herbal teas.  Ingar has been working with a diversity of clients since 2008.
profile_positions.title: Clinical Nutritionist | Formulator & Developer | Women's Group Facilitator

profile_positions.description:
Summer Life Naturals is paving a new path in immune health.  Our formulas are profoundly effective yet gentle enough for sensitive individuals.  Our intention is to bring more harmony into the world by formulating plant-based supplements that resonate with our bodies without the harsh side effects. 

IMMUNE IMPACT™ is a new approach to existing herbal immune formulas on the market.  It's made with a synergistic blend of 7 harmonizing botanicals in a vegetarian capsule. The proprietary blend is formulated without the use of harsh herbs or ingredients like Echinacea, Goldenseal and magnesium stearate. This provides a unique and delicate ratio for optimal absorption. 

IMMUNE IMPACT™ soothes and supports the immune system, mucous membranes and upper respiratory tract.

We are presently expanding our company and interested in collaborating with like-minded people.  We are open to possibilities to bring our formulations and lifestyle format to the natural products community.
profile_positions.title: Founder | Formulator | CEO

profile_positions.description:
• Nutritional Cleansing and Balancing: whole foods, vegetarian, vegan, raw vegan living foods, gentle cleansing, deep hydration, proper nutritional absorption and maintaining balance

• Teacher, writer and speaker on herbs, traditional herb making (extracts, decoctions, oils, glycerites, blends), flower + plant energy wisdom, Reiki and other global traditions

• Certified Reiki Master Teacher trained in the Usui Tibetan Seichim Karuna and Ananda Rei traditions

• Professionally Certified in Neuroendocrine and Anti-Aging Regulation - Emphasis in herbalism, nutraceuticals and homeopathy.
profile_positions.title: Clinical Nutritionist, Herbalist, Formulator, Certifed Reiki Master Teacher

profile_positions.description:
• BellSouth/AT& T Tower permament public art space installation 2004: Developed and installed permanent public art installation space for two ground floor lobby areas.  Curatorial planning and art exhibit program development.  

• Brooklyn Art and Design Center 2003: curatorial services, visual and performing arts installations include exhibits entitled MORTAR & PESTLE and BREATHING TOWARD AFFINITY.  Developed program, installation, funding and marketing for multi-disciplined exhibition.
profile_positions.title: Curatorial Planning and Program Development

profile_positions.description: Design and development, corporate identity, logo design, packaging design and print production as well as collateral for display marketing.  Clients include Leon Max Studio, JBL, Harmon Kardon, Warner Bros. Entertainment.  Including large format design for trade shows, entertainment and special events marketing.  Highlights include conceptualization, development, creative direction of photography, illustration and supportive mediums, print production, final completion and distribution.
profile_positions.title: Graphic Designer, Art Director, Creative Director
